name: Detached 3-room apartment for sale in Marasti neighborhood with balcony
shortDescription: Ideally located close to FSEGA Faculty, this 3 bedroom detached apartment offers the perfect opportunity for those looking for convenience.

name: 1-room apartment, 38 sqm, intermediate floor, southwest orientation, for sale in Marasti
shortDescription: We offer for sale a 1-room apartment located in an extremely easy and attractive area for rent, offering tenants the opportunity to have a 1-2 minute walk to public transport, 5 minutes from commercial spaces Kaufland, Lidl , Leroy Merlin, 15 minutes' walk to Iulius Mall, offices, educational centers as well as many other facilities.

name: Apartment at the house, Andrei Muresanu, 220 sqm total, garden
shortDescription: With a total area of 220 square meters on Jozsef Attila street no. 49 in the Andrei Muresanu neighborhood, Cluj-Napoca.The apartment, part of a house with 2 apartments (duplex), is divided as follows:- Mezzanine/Ground floor: garage 28 sqm, cellar 26 sqm; - Upper ground floor: kitchen, living room 28 sqm, service toilet, pantry, hall, access to the garden; - Floor: 2 rooms of 14 and 20 square meters, bathroom with glass, hall; - Loft/Attic: open space 56 sq m, height over 3 m; The two big assets of this property are, first of all, the area, only 1.8km from the center (16 min walk), located on a street with almost non-existent car traffic, set back from the main traffic arteries, which serves only the riversiders.

name: 3-room apartment, 74 sqm, Piata Unirii area
shortDescription: The apartment has own central heating system, divided as follows: kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a large living room and a bathroom. Due to this compartmentalization and the facilities it has, it is an excellent option for renting as a hotel, but also for a family.

name: 3 room Apartment, 65 sqm, Citadela Residence
shortDescription: A 3-room apartment for rent in the Citadela residential district, away from busy roads, it is located near the forest, the apartment is furnished and equipped, the compartmentation is arranged as follows: living room with open-space kitchen, two bedrooms, one matrimonial and a bedroom for children, two bathrooms and a balcony, the apartment has its own heating plant and the latest generation appliances, dishwasher, electric pita, electric oven, washing machine and fridge with freezer, available from August 1.

name: 3-room LUX apartment, 76 sqm, underground parking
shortDescription: For rent, luxury 3-room apartment with an area of 76 square meters, located in the semi-central area of Cluj. It is located on the 7th floor of a new building with 2 elevators.The compartmentation of the apartment is semi-detached, being arranged as follows: Open space living room with kitchen, 2 bedrooms, one of which is self contained with its own bathroom and a dressing room, lawn room with storage space, a bathroom with bathtub and an amazing terrace with a superb view + place grill. The apartment is equipped with high-quality furniture and finishes, being everything to order, dishwasher, air conditioning, own heating plant.In the rental price, future tenants benefit from an underground parking lot.It is available immediately

name: Modern studio for sale on Calea Victoriei
shortDescription: For sale amodern studio, located in an emblematic area of Bucharest, on Calea Victoriei.This property is on the 3rd floor of a block built between 1959 and 1962, offering a spectacular view of the intersection of Calea Victoriei, Strada Biserica Amzei and Calea Griviței. Built between 1959 and 1962, with two staircases, classified in the 2nd seismic risk class. The studio has been completely renovated, including the rehabilitation of the electrical installation and the replacement of the plumbing.Furnished: It is sold fully furnished, being ready both for living and for renting. Proximity to public transport, restaurants, cafes, shops and points of cultural and touristic interest.Panoramic view of an important intersection in Bucharest, offering an authentic urban experience.This studio apartment is ideal for those looking to live in a central, vibrant and lively area, or for investors looking for a ready-to-let property.

name: Luxury Apartment with 3 Rooms - Dorobanti area
shortDescription: For sale a luxury 3-room apartment, located in a premium location at the intersection of Tudor Ștefan and Banul Antonache streets, in the famous Dorobanti area. This exclusive property is in a boutique block with just 7 apartments and a retail space, offering you unparalleled privacy and comfort. Apartment heating plant, Underfloor heating for added comfort, High quality finishes, Modern and silent elevator. Exclusive building with only 7 apartments and a commercial space. Parking Space available above ground, included in the price. It is sold completely finished and ready to move into

name: Luxury apartment 100 sqm Boutique Iancului block
shortDescription: the apartment for sale is located in a boutique block built in 2019, in the Iancului market area, very close to the Mega Mall and the National Arena. It has a generous area of 100 square meters and benefits from a luxurious interior design, made under the guidance of a renowned designer.The apartment has 4 balconies, a spacious terrace and a private garage in the basement of the building. The block where the apartment is located has only four residential units, which ensures privacy and tranquility, the elevator with card ensures direct access to the apartment.The finishes are of the best quality, and the area where the apartment is located is safe from the crowded noise of the city, offering a quiet and relaxing atmosphere. Also, the area is rich in green spaces, which contributes to the creation of a pleasant and relaxing atmosphere.

name: New 2-room apartment - Mosilor
shortDescription: A new, 2-room apartment, with a usable area of 72 sqm, semi-detached, on the 4th floor. The apartment is located in the Mosilor area and is fully furnished and equipped.

name: Luxury Penthouse - Ghencea area
shortDescription: For sale a beautiful penthouse located in the Ghencea area.It has an area of 270 square meters (9th floor + 10th floor), 350 square meter exterior terrace with a 360 degree view. With a spectacular view of the city and a modern, sophisticated design of a new creative and vibrant lifestyle, this penthouse was created for you to enjoy unique moments in your new home. With an intelligent compartmentalization, the 4 rooms offer a large and bright space, perfect for enjoying moments of relaxation and socializing. Panoramic view: The large windows and the spacious terrace reveal the spectacular view of the city. With a sophisticated design, every detail of this penthouse has been carefully selected to create an atmosphere of luxury and sophistication, from the high quality materials to the impeccable finishes. Part of a multifunctional complex, it offers its residents a wide variety of integrated facilities: restaurants, cafes, green spaces, children's playground, innovative offices, amazing views and exclusive apartments. This remarkable penthouse represents the perfect combination of luxury, comfort and premium lifestyle. It is more than a house - it is a statement of refinement and good taste, ready to become a home for those who appreciate the true value of quality urban life.

name: 3-room apartment, 230 sqm, Herastrau neighborhood
shortDescription: for rent a 3-room apartment, located on the 2nd/6th floor, detached, 230 sqm surface, luxury comfort, year of construction 2009, in the French district, in Herastrau..

name: LUXURY 3-room apartment, pet friendly, 94 sqm
shortDescription: for rent a very spacious and modern 3-room apartment, located in the heart of the French district, in a new building, completed in 2008. The apartment is located in a particularly quiet area, 2 minutes' walk from Herastrau Park, but at the same time very close to public transport and shopping centers. At the same time, the apartment has luxury finishes: solid wood parquet, Italian tiles and tiles, solid wood doors, air conditioning in each room, fully equipped kitchen with the latest generation appliances (hob, oven, hood, dishwasher, refrigerator), 2 modern bathrooms, with shower cabin and bathtub, spacious living room, 2 bedrooms, 2 balconies and a spacious terrace, perfect for relaxing! There is also 1 underground parking space that can be rented for 150 euros, and a storage box in the basement. Maintenance costs are reduced thanks to the latest generation efficient heating system.

name: 2-room apartment for rent in Onix Park Pipera
shortDescription: For rent an elegant, fully equipped and furnished apartment in the Onix Park complex. The apartment is available immediately and accepts pets under certain conditions.Underfloor heating, Closed kitchen, Two bathrooms, Two air conditioners (in bedroom and living room), Large terrace with WPC flooring, Guard in the complex.There are two walk-in closets, and all the furniture is new, custom-made. The complex is very quiet and the maintenance costs are low. The parking space is not included, but can be rented separately from the existing ones.
